tossup_question: 5) EARTH AND SPACE  What is the name for the type of solar events, which cause gigantic magnetic disturbances along with large amounts of plasma?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Prominence
X) Solar flare
Y) Coronal mass ejection
Z) Sunspot
bonus_question: 5) EARTH AND SPACE  When analyzing the spectrum of a star, you see that its spectral lines have wavelengths that are slightly increased. Which of the following is the star most likely doing?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Moving towards you
X) Moving away from you
Y) Not moving
Z) Spontaneous combustion
bonus_answer: ANSWER: X) Moving away from you
